about.title:
About
Town of Luxury
about.established: was established in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in
about.establishedSuffix: . Since inception, the company has built a strong presence across GCC countries.
about.descriptionSuffix: to a diverse range of clients, from private villas to commercial developments.
about.quote: Guided by a leadership team with over 30 years of experience in the GCC, particularly within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, bringing deep market insight, operational excellence, and unwavering commitment to global best practices.

Message
ceo.name: Eng. Abdulsalam Saymeh
ceo.quotePrefix: At Town of Luxury, we believe that
ceo.quoteHighlight: great spaces begin with strong relationships
ceo.message1Mid: in the construction and fit-out industry across the GCC, I have learned that
ceo.message1Suffix: are the true foundations of long-term success.
ceo.message2Prefix: Since our establishment in 2022, our goal has been simple: to
ceo.message2Bold: transform ideas into inspiring, functional spaces
ceo.message2Suffix: while exceeding our clients' expectations. Every project we undertake is driven by care, precision, and a genuine passion for excellence.
ceo.highlightBold: Our people are our greatest strength.
ceo.highlightSuffix: Together, we embrace challenges, adapt to fast-paced environments, and deliver with pride—always placing our clients at the heart of everything we do.
ceo.closing: Thank you for trusting Town of Luxury.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: From concept to completion, we deliver comprehensive construction and fit-out solutions tailored to your needs.
services.residentialDesc: As a general contracting and fit-out company, we deliver a
services.privateVillasDesc: Crafting bespoke living spaces with attention to every detail
services.commercialDesc: We undertake commercial construction projects, including
services.commercialDescHighlight: drive-thrus, public squares, and small shopping malls
services.interiorFitoutSuffix: , delivering tailored solutions for retail spaces, restaurants, cafes, and offices.
services.completeDeliveryDesc: From shell to fully operational space

residential.title: Residential
residential.description: As a general contracting and fit-out company, we deliver a wide range of residential projects, including villas and multi-storey buildings. Our services range from skeleton and envelope works to full fit-out and MEP solutions, with complete turnkey and design-and-build options available.

commercial.title: Commercial
commercial.description: We also undertake commercial construction projects, including drive-thru(s), public squares, and small shopping malls. Our scope typically includes skeleton works, initial MEP installations, and site development. In most cases, retail units are delivered on a shell-and-core basis, with tenant fit-out works handled separately.

fitout.title: Fit-Out
fitout.description: Fit-out is our core specialty, delivering tailored solutions for retail spaces, restaurants, cafes, and offices. We offer both build-only and design-and-build services, covering full interior fit-outs, MEP second and final fixes, as well as loose furniture and equipment where required - ensuring a complete and seamless final product.

designBuild.title: Design and Build
designBuild.description: Flexible solutions from skeleton-only construction to complete turnkey delivery. We manage the entire process from initial concept through final handover, ensuring quality and consistency at every stage.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore our portfolio of successfully delivered projects across the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
